pr_title: Refactor RLStatement and TCLStatement to different dialect Statement

timeline.message: Refactor RLStatement and TCLStatement to different dialect Statement

timeline.bodyText: Do you think it is better to move TCLStatement to its father class SetAutoCommitStatement if they extend the same abstract class?
timeline.author: tristaZero
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@

+package org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.dialect.statement.sqlserver.tcl;
+
+import lombok.Getter;
+import lombok.Setter;
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.statement.tcl.SetAutoCommitStatement;
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.statement.tcl.TCLStatement;
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.dialect.statement.sqlserver.SQLServerStatement;
+
+/**
+ * SQLServer set auto commit statement.
+ */
+@Getter
+@Setter
+public final class SQLServerSetAutoCommitStatement extends SetAutoCommitStatement implements TCLStatement, SQLServerStatement {

replies.bodyText:
Do you think it is better to move TCLStatement to its father class SetAutoCommitStatement if they extend the same abstract class?

@tristaZero Yes, this is a mistake in my refactor, and I will optimize it.
replies.author: strongduanmu

+
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.statement.tcl.BeginTransactionStatement;
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.statement.tcl.TCLStatement;
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.dialect.statement.mysql.MySQLStatement;
+
+/**
+ * MySQL begin transaction statement.
+ */
+public final class MySQLBeginTransactionStatement extends BeginTransactionStatement implements TCLStatement, MySQLStatement {

replies.bodyText:
Move implements TCLStatement to BeginTransactionStatement ?

@tristaZero This sounds great, and extracting to the parent class will make the child class more concise. 👍
replies.author: strongduanmu
